original_text: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times and in every way. The Lord be with all of you.
korean_text: 평강의 주께서 친히 때마다 일마다 너희에게 평강을 주시고 주께서 너희 모든 사람과 함께 하시기를 원하노라

sentences.original_text: Now may the Lord of peace himself
give you peace at all times
The Lord be with all of you
